summary.para: Gets the interface ID of an agile reference to an object.

param.name: pp
param.para: The interface ID of the interface to be retrieved from the agile reference. It is not required to be the same as the registered interface.

param.name: unnamedParam2
param.para: On successful completion, *ppvObjectReference is a pointer to the interface specified by riid.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The requested interface isn't implemented on the registered object.

remarks.para: Call the function to create an agile reference to an object. Call the Resolve method to localize the object into the apartment in which Resolve is called.

summary.para: Gets the interface ID of an agile reference to an object.

param.para: The interface ID of the interface to be retrieved from the agile reference. It is not required to be the same as the registered interface.

param.name: ppvObjectReference
param.para: On successful completion, *ppvObjectReference is a pointer to the interface specified by riid.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The requested interface isn't implemented on the registered object.

remarks.para: Call the function to create an agile reference to an object. Call the Resolve method to localize the object into the apartment in which Resolve is called.

summary.para: Enables retrieving an agile reference to an object.

remarks.para: Call the function to create an agile reference to an object.
